item.title: â¬›Black Box Testing
item.description: Benefits of black box testing: Easy to use as testers do not need to know the inner workings of product …tester need not know programming languages …can work through application as would a user Test case can be developed quicker than for white box testing …testers need only look at GUI …do not need to discover all the internal paths ….tests are done from point of view of a user …can expose discrepancies in specification Tests can be conducted by independent personnel from the developers allowing for an objective perspective ….
